name: Misshapen
description:
A story-driven body-horror simulator where you can’t kill your enemies but you can distort their bodies in creepy ways. Grow lumps, build weird living structures and dive into the dark mysteries of Zheltikov’s military base.




Zheltikov is a scientific-military base dedicated to the study of the volcano of the same name. The facility has grown like a huge and distorted creature in the surroundings of the mountain... And even inside! Different experiments related to Zheltikov’s unique lava were conducted across the base, including some tests focusing on the correlation between geological phenomena and the human psyche… And then the volcano erupted.




Featuring:
  • A semi open world fps adventure with quests, side quests and environmental puzzles.
  • Discover different types of ways of distorting enemies bodies: sticky lumps, heavy lumps, floating lumps and more!
  • Communicate to a wide variety of characters, examine different objects and draw your own conclusions in a dark and rich narrative world.



Note:
Game is currently under development. All gameplay clips and screenshots shown above are from an early pre-alpha build.
